title: Ark Energy wins tender for world's largest 8-hour lithium battery - pv magazine International
summary: The article discusses a large-scale battery energy storage system project using lithium-iron phosphate technology at the proposed Richmond Valley Solar Farm site in NSW, aiding in renewable energy generation and storage.
